name: plume-css
description: A tiny framework for sass/css artisans

scripts.build: npm run build-sass && sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/scss/plume.scss dist/css/plume.min.css && npm run build-autoprefix
scripts.dev: npm run build-sass && sass --watch --no-source-map src/scss/plume.scss dist/css/plume.css
